00054 CodeBook::CodeBook
00055 (
00056         unsigned numA,
00057         unsigned dimA
00058 )
00059   : m( numA, dimA )
00060 {
00061         //
00062         // initialize all means with uniformly distributed pseudo random numbers
00063         //
00064     for( unsigned i = m.nelem( ); i--; m.elem( i ) = Rng::uni( ) );
00065 }

00089 
00090 unsigned CodeBook::nearest
00091 (
00092         const Array< double >& v
00093 ) const
00094 {
00095     unsigned i, j;
00096     double   d, e = 0;
00097 
00098     //
00099     // compute distances to reference vectors
00100     //
00101     for( i = j = 0; i < size( ); ++i )
00102         {
00103                 //
00104                 // get distance || v - w ||^2
00105                 //
00106                 d = sqrDistance( m[ i ], v );
00107 
00108                 //
00109                 // get nearest vector
00110                 //
00111                 if( i == 0 || d < e )
00112                 {
00113                         j = i;
00114                         e = d;
00115                 }
00116     }
00117 
00118     return j;
00119 }

00133 
00134 void CodeBook::initialize
00135 (
00136         const Array< double >& v
00137 )
00138 {
00139     SIZE_CHECK( v.ndim( ) == 2 )
00140 
00141     Array< double > min( v[ 0 ] );
00142     Array< double > max( v[ 0 ] );
00143 
00144     for( unsigned i = 1; i < v.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00145         {
00146                 for( unsigned j = 0; j < min.dim( 0 ); ++j )
00147                 {
00148                         if( v( i, j ) < min( j ) )
00149                         {
00150                                 min( j ) = v( i, j );
00151                         }
00152                         if( v( i, j ) > max( j ) )
00153                         {
00154                                 max( j ) = v( i, j );
00155                         }
00156                 }
00157         }
00158 
00159     initialize( min, max );
00160 }

00164 void CodeBook::initialize
00165 (
00166         const Array< double >& min,
00167         const Array< double >& max
00168 )
00169 {
00170     SIZE_CHECK( min.ndim( ) == 1 && min.samedim( max ) )
00171 
00172     m.resize( size( ), min.dim( 0 ) );
00173 
00174     for( unsigned i = 0; i < size( ); ++i )
00175         {
00176         for( unsigned j = 0; j < dim( ); ++j )
00177                 {
00178                         m( i, j ) = Rng::uni( min( j ), max( j ) );
00179                 }
00180     }
00181 }

00184 
00185 void CodeBook::kmc
00186 (
00187         const Array< double >& x,
00188         double prec,
00189         unsigned maxiter
00190 )
00191 {
00192     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) == 2 && x.dim( 1 ) == dim( ) && x.nelem( ) > 0 )
00193 
00194     bool first = true;
00195     unsigned i, k;
00196     double   dist;
00197     Array< double   > mean( size( ), dim( ) );
00198     Array< unsigned > num ( size( ) );
00199 
00200     do
00201         {
00202         mean = 0.;
00203                 num  = 0;
00204 
00205                 for( k = x.dim( 0 ); k--; )
00206                 {
00207                         i = nearest( x[ k ] );
00208                         mean[ i ] += x[ k ];
00209                         num ( i ) ++;
00210                 }
00211 
00212                 for( i = size( ); i--; )
00213                 {
00214                         if( num( i ) )
00215                         {
00216                                 mean[ i ] /= double( num( i ) );
00217                         }
00218                         else
00219                         {
00220                                 m[ i ] = mean[ i ] = x[ unsigned( Rng::uni( 0, x.dim( 0 ) ) ) ];
00221                         }
00222                 }
00223 
00224                 if( first )
00225                 {
00226                         first = false;
00227                         dist  = 10 * prec + 1;
00228                 }
00229                 else
00230                 {
00231                         Array< double >::iterator oldMeanL = m.begin( );
00232                         Array< double >::iterator newMeanL = mean.begin( );
00233 
00234                         dist = 0;
00235                         while( oldMeanL != m.end( ) )
00236                         {
00237                                 double dL = fabs( *oldMeanL++ - *newMeanL++ );
00238 
00239                                 if( dist < dL )
00240                                 {
00241                                         dist = dL;
00242                                 }
00243                         }
00244                 }
00245 
00246                 m = mean;
00247     }
00248         while( dist > prec && --maxiter != 0 );
00249 }
